qas.question: What caused child labour to decrease in the 20th century?
What caused child labour to decrease in Vietnam?
What do these scholars suggest with regards to child labour reductions?

answers.text: emphasis on opening quality schools rather than more laws and expanding economically relevant skill development opportunities in the third world

qas.question: What do international actions do according to these scholars?

Child labour laws and ILO conventions came later. Edmonds suggests, even in contemporary times, the incidence of child labour in Vietnam has rapidly reduced following <a1_0>economic reforms<a1_0/> and GDP growth.
